profileAlternative.name: Yijun (Jack) Dong
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Morgan Stanley
profileAlternative.summary:
Experienced Data Scientist with a demonstrated history of working in the financial services industry with a focus on research. Strong quantitative professional with a Bachelor’s Degree in Mathematics with additional major in Computer Science and additional minor in Computational Finance from Carnegie Mellon University.

* Specialized in applying data science and machine learning techniques to identify patterns and obtain insights from large datasets and alternative data sources
* Programming skills in R, Python, Hadoop, SQL, Unix, Java, C

aboutAlternative.text:

items: Functional Programming: Parallel and Sequential Data Structures and Algorithms
